div.l: But at þe laste his master hym bethowth
Vpon a day when he his Paper sowth
Of a ꝓproủerbe þat seieth þis same woord
Well better is roten appul out of hoord
Than þat he rote all þe remnant
So farith it by a Riotous Seruant
It is wel lasse harme to lete hym passe
Þan he schende all þe ʆseruauntis in þe place
Þ̉erfor his master made hym acquitance
And bade hym to goo wᵗith sorowe ⁊and myschance
And þus þis ioly P̉errentys had his leve
Nowe lete hym riote all nyght or leve
And þer is no Thefe wᵗithout a lowke
That helpith hym to wast ⁊and to sowke
Of þat he bribe can̄ or borowe may
Anon he sent his bedde wᵗith his array
Vnto a Compere of his own sort
That loued Dyse Riot ⁊and disport
⁊And had a wife þat helde for countenᵃaunce
A shopp̄e / and swyved for here sustenᵃaunce
¶Oure oost sawe wel þat þe bright son
The Arc of his artificiall day had ron
The iiijth part / and half an houre and more
And þowgh he were not depe stirt in lore
He wiste well it was þe xxviijth day
Of Aprill þat is messangere to May
And sawgh well// þᵗat þe schadowe of þe tree
Was as in lenght the same quantite
Þat was þe body erect þat caused it
And þ̉er/refor bi þe schadowe he took his witt
Þat Phebus which þat schone so clere ⁊and bright
Degrees was / xlv clombe on hight
And for þat day as in þat latitude
It was ten att þe Clok he gan conclude
And sodenly / he plight his hors about
Lordynges qd he y warne you al þe rout
The iiijth part of this Day is goon
Now for þe love of god ⁊and of Seynt Iohn
Lesith no tyme as ferforth as ye may
Lordynges þe tyme wastith boþe nyght ⁊and day
And stelith frōm vs / what puyly slepyng
⁊and what þrowgh negligence in oure wakyng
As doth þe streem / þat turneth neủer/re a gayn
Descendyng frōm þe mountayn into þe playn
Well can Senec and many a Philosofre
Be waile tyme more / þan gold in cofre
For lost of Catel may recouered bee
But lost of tyme schendith vs qd hee
It wol not come agayn wᵗithout drede
Nomore þan woll Malkyns maydenhede
Whan sche hath loste it in here wantones
Lete vs not ride þus in Idilnes
